operatorGRGminimumSatisfiedExternal(addr.details: external check if minimum pool operator GRG amount requirement satisfied.

params.amount: Number of tokens to be transferred.
params.token: Address of the token to be transferred.

operatorGRGminimumSatisfiedExternal(addr.return: Bool the transaction was successful.Number of GRG pool operator shortfall.

transferToSelfCustody(address,address,ui.details: transfers ETH or tokens to self custody.
transferToSelfCustody(address,address,ui.return: Bool the transaction was successful.Number of GRG pool operator shortfall.
